Date of Release: 12 September 2013

Genre: Action, 3D, 1st Person, 3rd Person

Developer: Bohemia Interactive

Publishing House: Bohemia Interactive

Developer Website: http://www.arma3.com/

Platform: PC [Repack]

Tablet: RELOADED 

File Version: 1.14



Description:

ARMA 3 - a new milestone in the genre of tactical military simulation from independent studio Bohemia Interactive, creators of the acclaimed Operation Flashpoint. ARMA 3 absorbed all the best from the previous games in the series and has introduced many innovations . New physics engine allows the player to control the unprecedented realism fighting. The new model of behavior technology , the broadest range of weapons , from the already become classic M16 and AK74 before prototypes are not yet enrolled in a wide use, as well as the long-awaited series of fans the opportunity to swim under water. After several years of exhausting war , Europe has become the last refuge of the battles weakened NATO . Stratis island captured by the enemy on the Middle East and it will gain guaranteed superiority of NATO in the region. Operation has begun , " Magnitude " : a small group of specially trained soldiers with scientists undercover sent to the island in the Mediterranean Sea . Mission in danger of collapse ! The team is almost completely destroyed, and the main character, Captain Scott Miller washed ashore enemy island. Complete the operation in his power , but his way there all the dangers of modern warfare , ruthless environment and numerical superiority of the enemy . Ponder will have every step !

Features: 

- New game engine allows you to control the fighting with unprecedented realism.
- Now you can dive under the water !
- Variety of weapons - from the "classic" AK-74 and M- 16 and not yet released into production prototypes.
- Combining all the positive qualities predecessors, with a new engine and evolutionary features , ARMA 3 provides the player with nothing comparable experience tactical combat.
- Create your own game scenarios using a simple and intuitive mission editor .

Features of Release:

Do not cut / recoded
